name: GIN Register
query:
select `tabPurchase Receipt`.`gate_entry_no` as "GateEntryNo:Data:120",
`tabPurchase Receipt`.`date` as "GateEntryDate:Date:100",
 `tabPurchase Receipt`.supplier_delivery_note as "BillNo:Data:100",
    `tabPurchase Receipt`.`name` as "GINo:Link/Purchase Receipt:150",
  	`tabPurchase Receipt`.`posting_date` as "GINDate:Date:100",
  	`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.`purchase_order` as "PO:data:100",
   	`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.`quality_inspection` as "MRN Inspection:data:100",
   	"" as "MRN Inspection Date:data:100",
	`tabPurchase Receipt`.`supplier` as "Vendor:Link/Supplier:200",
	`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.`item_group` as "Group:data:100",
	`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.`item_group` as "Category:data:100",
	`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.`item_name` as "Item:data:200",
	`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.item_code as "Part No:data:100",
	"INR" as "Currency:50",
	`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.rate as "Rate:Data:50",
	`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.received_qty as "Qty:Float:100", 
	`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.qty as "Approved Qty:Float:100", 
    `tabPurchase Receipt Item`.stock_uom as "Unit:Data:50",
    `tabPurchase Receipt Item`.amount as "Grand Total:Float:100",
    `tabPurchase Receipt Item`.net_amount as "Net Total:Float:100"
   
from
	`tabPurchase Receipt`, `tabPurchase Receipt Item`
where
	`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.`parent` = `tabPurchase Receipt`.`name`
	and `tabPurchase Receipt`.docstatus = 1
and `tabPurchase Receipt`.posting_date>=%(from_date)s and `tabPurchase Receipt`.posting_date<=%(to_date)s
Order by `tabPurchase Receipt`.posting_date asc

name: Supplier List DFM
query:
select
  s.supplier_code as "Code:100",
  s.supplier_name as"Vendor Name:Link/Supplier:100" ,
  s.category as "Nature of Party:100",
  a.address_line1 as "Address:200",
  c.first_name as "Contact Name:100",
 cp.phone as "Contact Phone:100",
  a.city as "City:100",
  a.state as "State:100",
  a.country as "Country:100",
  a.pincode as "PIN Code:100",
  a.phone as "Phone:100",
  a.email_id as "Email ID:100",
  s.pan as "PAN No:100",
  s.excise_registration_no as "Excise Registration No",
  s.iso_registration_no as "ISO Registration No",
  s.iso_registration_date as "ISO Registration Date",
  a.gstin as "GSTIN NO",
  a.gstin_registration_date as "GSTIN Reg. Date:Date",
  s.msme_registration_no as "MSME Registration No",
  s.fssai_license_no as "FSSAI Licence No",
  s.fssai_valid_from as "Valid From",
  s.fssai_valid_to_ as "Valid To",
  s.bank_name as "Bank Name",
  s.bank_account_no as "Bank Account"
  
  
 
from `tabSupplier` s
left join `tabAddress` a 
on
   s.supplier_name = a.address_title 
left join `tabDynamic Link` dl on dl.link_name=s.name
left join `tabContact` c on c.name=dl.parent
left join `tabContact Phone` cp on cp.parent = c.name

name: Unauthorized PO DFM
query:
select 
po.workflow_state as "Status",
po.name as "Purchase Order No",
po.po_type as "Purchase Order Type",
po.transaction_date as "Purchase Order Date:Date:100",
po.supplier as "Supplier/Vendor Name",
pi.item_name as "Item Name",
item.category as "Item Category",
item.item_sub_group as "Item Sub Group",
item.item_group as "Item Group",
pi.item_code as "Item Code",
pi.po_qty as "PO Qty:Float:100",
pi.rate as "Rate:Float:100",
pi.amount as "Gross Total:Float:100"


from `tabPurchase Order` po , `tabPurchase Order Item` pi , `tabItem` item
Where pi.parent=po.name  and 
item.item_name=pi.item_name and 
workflow_state= "Pending For Approval" ;

name: Material Issue DFM
query:
select
  se.posting_date as "Date:Date:100",
  se.name as "No:Link/Stock Entry:100",
  se.company as "Company",
  sd.item_code as "Item Code:100",
  sd.item_name as "Item Name:100",
  i.item_sub_group as "Item sub Group:100",
  i.item_group as "Item Group:100",
  i.stock_uom as "UOM:100",
  i.category as "Category:100",
  sd.qty as "QTY:100",
  sd.basic_rate as "Rate:Currency:100",
  sd.batch_no as "Batch No:100",
  bat.expiry_date as "Batch Expiry Date:100",
  sd.s_warehouse as "Warehouse:100",
 bat.reference_name as "MRN NO:100",
 pr.posting_date as "MRN Date:100"
 
 

from `tabStock Entry` se , `tabStock Entry Detail` sd , `tabItem` i, `tabBatch` bat, `tabPurchase Receipt` pr

where
  sd.batch_no=bat.name and
  bat.reference_doctype="Purchase Receipt" and
  bat.reference_name=pr.name and
  sd.parent= se.name and
  stock_entry_type="Material Issue" and
  sd.item_code = i.item_code and
  se.company=%(company)s  and se.posting_date>=%(from_date)s and  se.posting_date<=%(to_date)s
order by  se.posting_date desc;

name: Material Transfer DFM
query:
select

  se.name as "MT No:Link/Stock Entry",
  se.stock_entry_type as "Stock Entry Type",
  se.posting_date as "Posting Date:Date",
  sd.item_code as "Item Code",
  sd.item_name as "Item Name",
  i.item_sub_group as "Item sub Group",
  i.item_group as "Item Group",
  i.category as "Category",
  sd.qty as "QTY",
  sd.batch_no as "Batch No",
  bat.expiry_date as "Batch Expiry Date:100",
  se.company as "Company",
  sd.s_warehouse as "Source Warehouse",
  sd.t_warehouse as "Target Warehouse",
  bat.reference_name as "MRN NO:100",
  pr.posting_date as "MRN Date:100"
  
 
from `tabStock Entry` se , `tabStock Entry Detail` sd , `tabItem` i, `tabBatch` bat,`tabPurchase Receipt` pr

where
  sd.batch_no=bat.name and
  bat.reference_doctype="Purchase Receipt" and
  bat.reference_name=pr.name and
  sd.parent= se.name and
  stock_entry_type="Material Transfer" and
  sd.item_code = i.item_code and se.posting_date>=%(from_date)s and se.posting_date<=%(to_date)s
order by se.posting_date desc;

name: MRN Register DFM
query:
select 
    pr.name as "MRN No:Link/Purchase Receipt:150",
    pr.posting_date as "MRN Date:Date:100",
    pr.supplier as "Party Name:Supplier:100",
    pr.gate_entry_no as "Gate Entry No:100",
    pr.date as "Date:Date:100",
    pr.mrn_type as "MRN Type",
    pr.company as "Company",
    pr.supplier_bill_no as "Bill No:100",
    pr.supplier_invoice_date as "Bill Date:Date:100",
    pr.vehicle_no as "Vehicle No:100",
    pi.purchase_order as "PO:100",
    pi.po_qty as "PO QTY:Float:100",
    pi.invoice_quantity as "Invoice Qty:Float:100",
    pi.received_qty as "Received QTY:Float:100",
    pi.qty as "Approved Qty:Float:100",
     pi.short_quantity as "Short Qty:Float:100",
   pi.rejected_qty as "Rejected Qty:Float:100",
    pi.item_name as "Item:Data:200",
	pi.item_code as "Item Code:Data:100",
	pi.vendor_batch_no as "Vendor Batch No:Data:100",
	pi.batch_no as "Batch No:Data:100",
	pi.manufacturing_date as "Manufacturing Date:Date",
	pi.expiry_date as "Expiry Date:Date",
	pi.item_group as "Group Name:data:100",
	item.item_sub_group as "Item sub Group:100",
    item.category as "Category:data:100",
	pi.rate as "Rate:Data:50",
    pi.stock_uom as "Unit:Data:50",
    pi.amount as "Grand Total:Float:100",
    pi.net_amount as "Net Total:Float:100",
    pi.transfer_lot_no as "Transfer Lot No:100",
    item.product_line as "Product Line:100",
    item.product_category as "Product Category:100",
    item.price_category as "Price Category:100",
    item.product_Variant as "Product Variant:100",
    item.promo_code as "Promo Code:100",
    pi.warehouse as "Store:100"
from
	`tabPurchase Receipt` pr
	left join `tabPurchase Receipt Item` pi on pr.name = pi.parent
	left join `tabQuality Inspection` qi on  pi.quality_inspection=qi.name
	left join `tabItem` item on item.item_code=pi.item_code
where
   pr.docstatus=1 and
pr.posting_date >=%(from_date)s and pr.posting_date <=%(to_date)s and pr.company = %(company)s
order by pr.posting_date desc ;

name: Quality Inspection DFM
query:
Select 
  pi.quality_inspection as "QC No",
  pr.posting_date as "QC:Date",
  pr.name as "MRN No",
  pr.posting_date as "MRN Date:Date",
  pr.gate_entry_no as "Gate Entry  no",
  pr.date as "Gate Entry Date:Date:100",
  pr.supplier as "Party Name",
  pr.supplier_bill_no as "Party Bill/Challan No",
  pr.date as "Party Bill/Challan Date:Date",
  pi.item_name as "Item Name",
  pi.item_code as "Item Code",
  pi.item_group as "Item Group",
  pi.batch_no as "Batch No",
  qi.acc_qty as "MRN Base Qty:Float:100",
  qi.approved_quantity as "Approved Qty:Float:100",
  qi.rejected_qty as "Rejected Qty:Float:100",
  qi.inspected_by as "Inspected By",
  qr.specification  as "Parameter",
  qr.status as "Grade",
  qr.value as "Observed Result",
  qi.remarks as "Remarks"
  
  
 
from `tabPurchase Receipt` pr,`tabPurchase Receipt Item` pi , `tabQuality Inspection` qi , `tabQuality Inspection Reading`qr
 WHERE
   pi.parent=pr.name and
   pi.quality_inspection = qi.name and
   qr.parent= qi.name

name: Item Batch Expiry Within 7 Days DFM
query:
select
 b.batch_id as "Batch No",
 b.item as "Item Code",
 i.item_name as "Item Name",
 b.manufacturing_date as "Manufacturing Date:Date",
 b.expiry_date as "Expiry Date:Date",
 DATEDIFF(b.expiry_date,Now()) as "Expiry(In Days)"

From 
  `tabBatch` b , `tabItem` i
where  
 b.item = i.item_code and
  DATEDIFF(b.expiry_date,Now())<8 and DATEDIFF(b.expiry_date,Now())>-1
report_name: Item Batch Expiry Within 7 Days DFM

roles.parent: Item Batch Expiry Within 7 Days DFM
Item Batch Expiry Within 7 Days DFM

name: Purchase Return
query:
SELECT
`tabPurchase Receipt`.`name` as "Purchase Receipt:Link/Purchase Receipt:150",
CASE WHEN `tabPurchase Receipt`.`docstatus` = 0 THEN "Pending"
    WHEN `tabPurchase Receipt`.`docstatus` = 1 THEN "Approved"
    ELSE "Cancelled"
    END AS "Status:150",
`tabPurchase Receipt`.`supplier` as "Supplier:Link/Supplier:150",
`tabPurchase Receipt`.`posting_date` as "Date:Date:150",
`tabPurchase Receipt`.`company` as "Company:Link/Company:200",
`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.`item_name` as "Item Name:Data:100",
`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.`item_code` as "Item Code:Link/Item:150",
`tabItem`.item_sub_group as "Item sub Group",
`tabItem`.item_group as "Item Group",
`tabItem`.category as "Category",
`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.`invoice_quantity` as "Invoice Quantity:Data:100"

FROM
`tabPurchase Receipt`, `tabPurchase Receipt Item`,`tabItem` 
WHERE
`tabPurchase Receipt`.`is_return` = true and 
`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.`parent`=`tabPurchase Receipt`.`name` and `tabItem`.item_code=`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.item_code

name: Plant Transfer
query:
SELECT
`tabDelivery Note`.name as "Delivery Note:Link/Delivery Note:150",
`tabDelivery Note`.posting_date as "Date:Date:100",
`tabDelivery Note`.company as "Company:Link/Company:180",
`tabDelivery Note`.customer as "Customer:Link/Customer:180",
`tabDelivery Note Item`.item_code as "Item Code:Link/Item:220",
`tabDelivery Note Item`.item_name as "Item Name:Data:100",
`tabItem`.item_sub_group as "Item Sub Group",
`tabItem`.category as "Item Category",
`tabItem`.item_group as "Item Group",
`tabDelivery Note Item`.qty as "Item Qty:Float:80",
`tabDelivery Note Item`.uom as "UOM :Data:80",
`tabDelivery Note Item`.rate as "Rate :Currency:80",
`tabDelivery Note Item`.amount as "Amount :Currency:100",
`tabDelivery Note Item`.batch_no as "Batch No :Data:100",
`tabDelivery Note`.mode_of_transport as "Mode Of Transport :Data:100"




FROM
`tabDelivery Note`, `tabDelivery Note Item` , `tabItem` 

WHERE
`tabDelivery Note Item`.parent = `tabDelivery Note`.name
and `tabDelivery Note`.customer not like "Scrap-Out" and
`tabItem`.item_code= `tabDelivery Note Item`.item_code

name: Plant Transfer DFM
query:
SELECT
`tabDelivery Note`.name as "Delivery Note:Link/Delivery Note:150",
`tabDelivery Note`.posting_date as "Date:Date:100",
`tabDelivery Note`.company as "Company:Link/Company:180",
`tabDelivery Note`.customer as "Customer:Link/Customer:180",
`tabDelivery Note Item`.item_code as "Item Code:Link/Item:220",
`tabDelivery Note Item`.item_name as "Item Name:Data:100",
`tabItem`.item_sub_group as "Item Sub Group",
`tabItem`.category as "Item Category",
`tabItem`.item_group as "Item Group",
`tabDelivery Note Item`.qty as "Item Qty:Float:80",
`tabDelivery Note Item`.uom as "UOM :Data:80",
`tabDelivery Note Item`.rate as "Rate :Currency:80",
`tabDelivery Note Item`.amount as "Amount :Currency:100",
`tabDelivery Note Item`.batch_no as "Batch No :Data:100",
`tabDelivery Note`.mode_of_transport as "Mode Of Transport :Data:100"

FROM
`tabDelivery Note`, `tabDelivery Note Item` , `tabItem` 

WHERE
`tabDelivery Note Item`.parent = `tabDelivery Note`.name
and `tabDelivery Note`.customer not like "Scrap-Out" and
`tabItem`.item_code= `tabDelivery Note Item`.item_code and
`tabDelivery Note`.company=%(company)s and
`tabDelivery Note`.posting_date >=%(from_date)s and `tabDelivery Note`.posting_date <=%(to_date)s
order by `tabDelivery Note`.posting_date desc ;

name: Quotation Comparison
query:
SELECT
sq.supplier as "Supplier:Link/Supplier:150",
sq.name as "Supplier Quatation:Link/Supplier Quotation:100",
sq.transaction_date as "Date:Date:100",
sqi.item_name as "Item:Data:150",
sqi.item_code as "Item Code",
i.item_group as "Item Group",
i.category as "Category",
i.item_sub_group as "Item Sub Group",
sqi.uom as "UOM:Link/UOM:50",
sqi.qty as "Quantity:Float:100",
sqi.amount as "Price:Currency:100",
sqi.stock_uom as "Stock UOM:Link/UOM:50",
sqi.rate as "Price Per Unit:Currency:100",
sqi.warehouse as "Warehouse",
sq.payment_term as "Payment Terms:200"


FROM
`tabSupplier Quotation` sq, `tabSupplier Quotation Item` sqi , `tabItem` i

WHERE
sqi.parent=sq.name and 
i.item_code = sqi.item_code and
i.item_code=%(item)s

name: Item Batch Expiry Within 15 days
query:
select
 b.batch_id as "Batch No",
 b.item as "Item Code",
 i.item_name as "Item Name",
 b.manufacturing_date as "Manufacturing Date:Date",
 b.expiry_date as "Expiry Date:Date",
 DATEDIFF(b.expiry_date,Now()) as "Expiry(In Days)"

From 
  `tabBatch` b , `tabItem` i
where  
 b.item = i.item_code and
  DATEDIFF(b.expiry_date,Now())<16 and DATEDIFF(b.expiry_date,Now())>-1

name: Quotation Comparison DFM
query:
SELECT
sq.supplier as "Supplier:Link/Supplier:150",
sq.name as "Supplier Quatation:Link/Supplier Quotation:100",
sq.transaction_date as "Date:Date:100",
sqi.item_name as "Item:Data:150",
sqi.item_code as "Item Code",
i.item_group as "Item Group",
i.category as "Category",
i.item_sub_group as "Item Sub Group",
sqi.uom as "UOM:Link/UOM:50",
sqi.qty as "Quantity:Float:100",
sqi.amount as "Price:Currency:100",
sqi.stock_uom as "Stock UOM:Link/UOM:50",
sqi.rate as "Price Per Unit:Currency:100",
sqi.warehouse as "Warehouse",
sq.payment_term as "Payment Terms:200"


FROM
`tabSupplier Quotation` sq, `tabSupplier Quotation Item` sqi , `tabItem` i

WHERE
sqi.parent=sq.name and 
i.item_code = sqi.item_code and
i.item_code=%(item)s

name: Consumption Report
Material Request DFM
query:
SELECT
mr.name as "ID:Link/Material Request:150",
mr.schedule_date as "Required Date:Date:100",
mr.material_request_type as "Type:Data:100",
mr.company as "Company:Link/Company:120",
mri.item_code as "Item Code:Link/Item:100",
mri.item_name as "Item Name:Data:150",
mri.qty as "Quantity:Float:80",
mri.uom as "UOM:Data:50",
mri.schedule_date as "Item Required Date:Date:100",
mri.warehouse as "For Warehouse:Data:180"
FROM
`tabMaterial Request` mr, `tabMaterial Request Item` mri
WHERE
mri.parent = mr.name and mr.schedule_date>=%(from_date)s and mr.schedule_date<=%(to_date)s
order by mr.schedule_date desc;

name: Material Transfer for MFG
query:
select
  se.posting_date as "Date:Date:100",
  se.name as "No:Link/Stock Entry:100",
  sd.item_code as "Item Code:100",
  sd.item_name as "Item Name:100",
  i.item_sub_group as "Item sub Group:100",
  i.item_group as "Item Group:100",
  i.category as "Category:100",
  sd.qty as "QTY:100",
  sd.conversion_factor as "Conversion Factor",
  sd.basic_rate as "Rate:Currency:100",
  sd.batch_no as "Batch No:100",
    se.company as "Company:100",
  sd.s_warehouse as "Warehouse:100",
 id.expense_account as "Default Expense Account:100"
 

from `tabStock Entry` se , `tabStock Entry Detail` sd , `tabItem` i,`tabItem Default` id

where
  sd.parent= se.name and
  stock_entry_type="Material Transfer for Manufacture" and
  sd.item_code = i.item_code and
  id.parent=i.name and 
  id.company=se.company

name: Material Transfer for MFG DFM
query:
select
 
  se.name as "No:Link/Stock Entry:100",
   se.posting_date as "Date:Date:100",
   se.company as "Company:100",
  sd.item_code as "Item Code:100",
  sd.item_name as "Item Name:100",
  i.item_sub_group as "Item sub Group:100",
  i.item_group as "Item Group:100",
  i.category as "Category:100",
  sd.qty as "QTY:100",
  sd.basic_rate as "Rate:Currency:100",
  sd.batch_no as "Batch No:100",
   
  sd.s_warehouse as "Warehouse:100"
 

from `tabStock Entry` se , `tabStock Entry Detail` sd , `tabItem` i,`tabItem Default` id

where
  sd.parent= se.name and se.docstatus=1 and
  stock_entry_type="Material Transfer for Manufacture" and
  sd.item_code = i.item_code and
  id.parent=i.name and 
  id.company=se.company and
  se.company =%(company)s  and se.posting_date>=%(from_date)s and  se.posting_date<=%(to_date)s
order by  se.posting_date desc;

name: Production Consumption Report -DFM
query:
select
se.name  as "No",
se.company as "Company",
se.posting_date as "Date:Date",
se.posting_time as "Time:TIME",
se.work_order as "Work Order",
se.bom_no as "Bom No",
se.fg_completed_qty as "Quantity:Float",
se.to_warehouse as "Default Target Warehouse",
sed.s_warehouse as "Source Warehouse",
sed.item_code as "Item Code",
sed.item_name as "Item Name",
sed.item_group as "Item Group",
sed.qty as "Quantity:Float",
sed.basic_rate as "Basic Rate:Float",
sed.basic_amount as "Basic Amount:Float",
sed.additional_cost as "Additional Cost:Float",
sed.amount as "Amount:Float",
sed.uom as "UOM",
sed.batch_no as "Batch No",
sed.expense_account as "Expense Account:Float",
sed.actual_qty as "Actual QTY:Float",
se.total_incoming_value as "Total Imcoming Value:Float",
se.total_outgoing_value as "Total Outgoing Value:Float",
se.value_difference as "Value Diffrence:Float"


from `tabStock Entry` se , `tabStock Entry Detail` sed
where 
sed.parent=se.name and
se.stock_entry_type="Manufacture"and 
se.docstatus=1

name: Production Consumption Report DFM
query:
select
se.name  as "No:Link/Stock Entry",
se.company as "Company",
se.stock_entry_type as "Stock Entry Type",
se.posting_date as "Date:Date",
se.posting_time as "Time:TIME",
se.work_order as "Work Order",
se.bom_no as "Bom No",
se.bom_item as "Bom Item:200",
se.fg_completed_qty as "Fg Quantity:Float",
se.to_warehouse as "Default Target Warehouse",
sed.s_warehouse as "Source Warehouse",
sed.item_code as "Item Code",
sed.item_name as "Item Name",
sed.item_group as "Item Group",
sed.qty as "Quantity:Float",
sed.basic_rate as "Basic Rate:Float",
sed.basic_amount as "Basic Amount:Float",
sed.additional_cost as "Additional Cost:Float",
sed.amount as "Amount:Float",
sed.uom as "UOM",
sed.batch_no as "Batch No",
sed.expense_account as "Expense Account:Float",
sed.actual_qty as "Actual QTY:Float",
se.total_incoming_value as "Total Imcoming Value:Float",
se.total_outgoing_value as "Total Outgoing Value:Float",
se.value_difference as "Value Difference:Float"

from `tabStock Entry` se , `tabStock Entry Detail` sed
where 
sed.parent=se.name and 
se.stock_entry_type="Manufacture" and 
se.docstatus=1 and
sed.item_group != 'Finished Goods' and
se.company=%(company)s and
se.posting_date>=%(from_date)s and se.posting_date<=%(to_date)s
order by se.posting_date desc;

name: Purchase Invoice Register Without GST
query:
select

pi.name as "No",
pi.supplier as "Supplier",
pi.company as "Company",
pi.posting_date as "Posting Date:Date",
pi.due_Date as "Due Date:Date",
pi.bill_no as "Supplier Invoice No",
pi.bill_date as "Supplier Invoice Date:Date",
pii.item_code as "Item Code",
pii.item_name as "Item Name",
pi.purchase_order as "PO No",
pi.transaction_date as "Po Date:Date",
pi.mrn_number as "MRN No",
pi.mrn_date as "MRN Date:Date",
pii.rate as "Rate:Currency",
pii.rate_s as "Bill Rate:Currency",
pii.invoice_quantity as "Bill Qty:Float",
pii.qty as "Acc Qty:Float",
pii.received_qty as "Received QTY:Float",
pii.rejected_qty as "Rejected Qty:Float",
pii.short_quantity as "Short QTY:Float",
pii.stock_uom as "UOM",
pii.amount as "Amount:Currency"


 from `tabPurchase Invoice` pi , `tabPurchase Invoice Item` pii
 where
 pii.parent = pi.name and
 is_return=0 and
 pi.company=%(company)s and
pi.posting_date>=%(from_date)s and pi.posting_date<=%(to_date)s
order by pi.posting_date desc;

name: Issues Action Tracker
query:
select
i.name as "Serial No:Link/Issue",
c.content as "Comment",
i.opening_date as "Date:Date",
i.source_of_input as "Source Of Input",
i.issue_type as "Nature of Concern",
i.category_of_concern as "Category of Concern",
i.subject as "Type of Issue",
i.send_gift_hamper as "Required Gift",
i.description as "Initial remarks on customer call",
i.phone_no as "Caller Contact No",
i.no_of_calls_by_customer as "No of Calls By Customer",
i.status as "Status",
i.no_of_call_back_attempted as "No of Call back Attempted",
i.call_back_date as "Call Back Date:Date",
i.caller_name as "Verified Caller Name",
i.state as "Verified Caller State",
i.address as "Verified Caller Address",
t.assigned_by_full_name as "Assigned By",
t.date as "Assigned Date:Date",
t.owner as "Allocated To:100"
from `tabIssue` i left join `tabToDo` t on i.name = t.reference_name 
left join `tabComment` c on i.name = c.reference_name and c.comment_type="Comment"
order by i.name asc;

name: User Activity Log Report
query:
select 

full_name as "User Name",
user as "User Mail Id",
subject as "Subject",
CAST(communication_date as date) as "Date:Date",
CAST(communication_date as time) as "Time:Time",
operation as "Operation",
status as "Status",
reference_doctype as "Reference Document",
reference_name as "Reference Name",
timeline_doctype as "Time Line Doctype",
timeline_name as "Timeline Name"


from `tabActivity Log`
where date(communication_date)>=%(from_date)s and date(communication_date)<=%(to_date)s
ORDER BY DATE(communication_date) DESC, Time(communication_date) DESC

name: FG Production
query:
SELECT
se.name  as "No:Link/Stock Entry",
se.company as "Company",
se.stock_entry_type as "Stock Entry Type",
se.posting_date as "Date:Date",
se.work_order as "Work Order",
se.line as "Line",
sed.s_warehouse as "Source Warehouse",
sed.t_warehouse as "Target Warehouse",
se.bom_no as "Bom No",
sed.item_code as "Item Code",
sed.item_name as "Item Name",
sed.item_group as "Item Group",
it.product_category as "Product Category",
it.price_category as "Price Category",
it.product_variant as "Product Varient",
sed.qty as "Quantity:Float",
sed.basic_rate as "Basic Rate:Float",
sed.basic_amount as "Basic Amount:Float",
sed.amount as "Amount:Float",
sed.uom as "UOM",
sed.qty * it.weight_per_unit as "Net Weight",
sed.batch_no as "Batch No",
sed.expense_account as "Expense Account:Float",
sed.actual_qty as "Actual QTY:Float",
se.total_incoming_value as "Total Imcoming Value:Float",
se.total_outgoing_value as "Total Outgoing Value:Float",
se.value_difference as "Value Difference:Float",
/*se.fg_completed_qty as "Total Box:Int",
uo.conversion_factor as "Conversion Factor:Int",*/
uo.conversion_factor * se.fg_completed_qty as "Total Packets"



FROM 
`tabStock Entry Detail` sed LEFT JOIN `tabItem` it ON sed.item_code = it.name, `tabStock Entry` se, `tabUOM Conversion Detail` uo

WHERE
uo.parent = it.name and
sed.parent = se.name and
se.docstatus=1 and
sed.item_group = 'Finished Goods'and
se.stock_entry_type = 'Manufacture' and
date(se.posting_date) %(from_date)s and

name: Manufacture report for DFM
query:
SELECT 
name as "NAME::200",
posting_date AS "POSTING DATE::200",
stock_entry_type AS "STOCK ENTRY TYPE::200 ",
company AS "COMPANY ::200",
posting_time AS "POSTING TIME::200",
work_order AS "WORK ORDER::200",
line AS "LINE::200",
bom_no AS "BOM NUMBER::200",
bom_item AS "BOM ITEM::200",
fg_completed_qty AS "For Quantity::200"
FROM `tabStock Entry`

name: Production Consumption 2
query:
select
se.name  as "No:Link/Stock Entry",
se.company as "Company",
se.stock_entry_type as "Stock Entry Type",
se.posting_date as "Date:Date",
se.posting_time as "Time:TIME",
se.work_order as "Work Order",
se.bom_no as "Bom No",
se.bom_item as "Bom Item:200",
se.fg_completed_qty as "Fg Quantity:Float",
sed.s_warehouse as "Source Warehouse",
sed.t_warehouse as "Target Warehouse",
sed.item_code as "Item Code",
sed.item_name as "Item Name",
sed.item_group as "Item Group",
case
    when sed.s_warehouse is NULL then -1*sed.qty else sed.qty end as "Quantity:Float",
sed.basic_rate as "Basic Rate:Float",
case
    when sed.s_warehouse is NULL then -1*sed.basic_amount else sed.basic_amount end as "Basic Amount:Float",
sed.additional_cost as "Additional Cost:Float",
case
    when sed.s_warehouse is NULL then -1*sed.amount  else sed.amount end as "Amount:Float",
sed.uom as "UOM",
sed.batch_no as "Batch No",
sed.expense_account as "Expense Account:Float",
sed.actual_qty as "Actual QTY:Float",
se.total_incoming_value as "Total Imcoming Value:Float",
se.total_outgoing_value as "Total Outgoing Value:Float",
se.value_difference as "Value Difference:Float"

from `tabStock Entry` se , `tabStock Entry Detail` sed
where 
sed.parent=se.name and 
se.stock_entry_type="Manufacture" and 
se.docstatus=1 and
sed.item_group != 'Finished Goods' and
se.company=%(company)s and
se.posting_date>=%(from_date)s and se.posting_date<=%(to_date)s
order by se.posting_date desc;

name: Production Consumption 3
query:
select
se.name  as "No:Link/Stock Entry",
se.company as "Company",
se.stock_entry_type as "Stock Entry Type",
se.reason as "Reason",
se.posting_date as "Date:Date",
se.posting_time as "Time:TIME",
se.work_order as "Work Order",
se.bom_no as "Bom No",
se.bom_item as "Bom Item:200",
se.fg_completed_qty as "Fg Quantity:Float",
sed.s_warehouse as "Source Warehouse",
sed.t_warehouse as "Target Warehouse",
sed.item_code as "Item Code",
sed.item_name as "Item Name",
sed.item_group as "Item Group",
case
    when sed.s_warehouse is NULL then -1*sed.qty else sed.qty end as "Quantity:Float",
sed.basic_rate as "Basic Rate:Float",
case
    when sed.s_warehouse is NULL then -1*sed.basic_amount else sed.basic_amount end as "Basic Amount:Float",
sed.additional_cost as "Additional Cost:Float",
case
    when sed.s_warehouse is NULL then -1*sed.amount  else sed.amount end as "Amount:Float",
sed.uom as "UOM",
sed.batch_no as "Batch No",
sed.expense_account as "Expense Account:Float",
sed.actual_qty as "Actual QTY:Float",
se.total_incoming_value as "Total Imcoming Value:Float",
se.total_outgoing_value as "Total Outgoing Value:Float",
se.value_difference as "Value Difference:Float"

from `tabStock Entry` se , `tabStock Entry Detail` sed

where 
sed.parent=se.name and 
(se.stock_entry_type = "Manufacture" or
(se.stock_entry_type = "Material Issue" and se.reason = "Consumption") or 
(se.stock_entry_type = "Material Receipt" and se.reason = "Consumption")) and
se.docstatus=1 and
sed.item_group != 'Finished Goods' and
se.company=%(company)s and
se.posting_date>=%(from_date)s and se.posting_date<=%(to_date)s
order by se.posting_date desc;

name: Sample Format
query:
select se.stock_entry_type,sed.s_warehouse,sed.t_warehouse,sed.item_code,sed.qty from `tabStock Entry` se,
`tabStock Entry Detail` sed where
sed.parent=se.name and se.posting_date between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s

name: Warehouse Linewise Report
query:
select sle.item_code as "Item:Link/Item:120",
sed1.item_name as "Item Name:200",
sed1.item_group as "Item Group:Link/Item Group:200",
sed1.stock_uom as "Stock UOM:200",
sum(sle.actual_qty) as "Opening Qty:120",
sle.posting_date as "Posting Date:Date:200",
sed1.warehouse as "Warehouse:Link/Warehouse:200"
from 
(select sed.item_code,
sed.item_name,
sed.item_group,
if(sed.s_warehouse is not null,sed.s_warehouse,sed.t_warehouse)  as warehouse,
sed.stock_uom,
sed.parent as entry_name
from `tabStock Entry Detail` sed group by warehouse,sed.item_code) as sed1 left join
`tabStock Ledger Entry` sle on sed1.item_code=sle.item_code 
where sle.docstatus < 2 and sle.posting_date <= %(from_date)s
group by sed1.warehouse,sle.item_code

name: Issue Test
query:
select
i.name as "Ticket ID:Link/Issue:120",
i.ticket_type as "Ticket Type::100",
u.first_name as "Closed By:100",
i.status as "Status",
t.assigned_by as "Assigned By",
t.owner as "Assigned To",
i.source_of_input as "Source of Input:150",
i.priority as "Priority",
i.sub_status as "Sub Status",
i.subject as "Subject::200",
i.issue_type as "Issue Type",
i.priority as "Priority",
i.category_of_concern as "Category of Concern",
i.creation as "Issue Date/Time:Datetime:200",
t.creation as "Ticket Assigned Datetime:Datetime:200",
i.issue_closing_date as "Ticket Closing Date/Time:Datetime:200",
/*i.classification_for_sla_priority as "Classification For SLA Priority",
i.dfm_team_effort_min as "DFM Team Effort Min",
i.vendor_involved as "Vendor Involved",
i.complexity as "Complexity",*/
i.description as "Description",
i.issue_reported_by as "Issue Reported By",
i.department as "Department",
i.email_id_of_user as "Email Id of User",
i.contact_no as "Contact No.",
t.description as "Comment",
i.resolution_details as "Internal Team Remarks"
from `tabIssue` i left join `tabToDo` t on i.name = t.reference_name inner join `tabUser` u on i.modified_by = u.name
where i.opening_date between %(from)s and %(to)s and i.ticket_type = %(ticket_type)s

name: BOM vs Actual
report_script:
def get_exploded_items(bom,raw = {},s_q=0,n_q=0):
	bom_q = frappe.db.get_value('BOM',bom,'quantity')
	""" Get all raw materials including items from child bom"""
	items = frappe.db.sql("""select bi.item_code, bi.item_name, bi.bom_no, bi.stock_uom, bi.stock_qty, bi.net_qty, 
				bi.stock_qty / ifnull(%s, 1) AS stock_qty_consumed_per_unit, bi.net_qty / ifnull(%s, 1) AS net_qty_consumed_per_unit,
				 bi.include_item_in_manufacturing from `tabBOM Item` bi where bi.parent = %s"""%(bom_q,bom_q,frappe.db.escape(bom)), as_dict=1 )
	for d in items:
		if d['bom_no']:
			raw = get_exploded_items(d['bom_no'],raw,(s_q*d['stock_qty_consumed_per_unit']),(n_q*d['net_qty_consumed_per_unit']))
			#frappe.msgprint(str(raw))
		else:
			if d['item_code'] in raw:
				#frappe.msgprint(str(d['item_code']))
				raw[d['item_code']] = {
					'stock_entry'				: '',
					'item_name'				: d['item_name'],
					'stock_uom'				: d['stock_uom'],
					'stock_qty'				: raw[d['item_code']]['stock_qty'] + d['stock_qty_consumed_per_unit'] * s_q,
					'net_qty'				: raw[d['item_code']]['net_qty']  + d['net_qty_consumed_per_unit'] * n_q,
					'consumed_qty'                          : 0,
					'yield'					: 0,
					'include_item_in_manufacturing': d.get('include_item_in_manufacturing', 0)
				}
				#frappe.msgprint(str(raw[d['item_code']]))

			else:
				raw[d['item_code']] = {
					'stock_entry'				: '',
					'item_name'				: d['item_name'],
					'stock_uom'				: d['stock_uom'],
					'stock_qty'				: d['stock_qty_consumed_per_unit'] * s_q,
					'net_qty'				: d['net_qty_consumed_per_unit'] * n_q,
					'consumed_qty'				: 0,
					'yield'					: 0,
					'include_item_in_manufacturing': d.get('include_item_in_manufacturing', 0)
                                }
				#frappe.msgprint(str(raw[d['item_code']]))

	return raw
	


	
def get_data(filters):
    conditions = ""
    if filters.get("from_date"):
	    conditions += " and date >= '%s'" % filters["from_date"]

    if filters.get("to_date"):
	    conditions += " and date <= '%s'" % filters["to_date"]

    if filters.get("company"):
	    conditions += " and company = '%s'" % filters["company"]
    else:
	    frappe.throw('Please Select company first')
	    
    d=frappe.db.sql("""SELECT company, production_plan ,name as work_order ,qty as fg_qty, produced_qty,
	production_item as fg_item, item_name as fg_name, bom_no FROM `tabWork Order` where docstatus = 1 and produced_qty > 0 %s """%conditions,as_dict=1)
	
    for r in d:
        r[r['work_order']]=get_exploded_items(r['bom_no'],{},r['fg_qty'],r['fg_qty'])
        se_name=frappe.get_list('Stock Entry',{'work_order': r['work_order']},'name')
        for se in se_name:
            temp=frappe.db.sql("""select item_code,sum(qty) as qty from `tabStock Entry Detail` sed, `tabStock Entry` se where sed.parent=%s and sed.parent = se.name and se.docstatus=1 and item_group!='Finished Goods' group by item_code""",se['name'],as_dict=1)
            for t in temp:
                try:
                    r[r['work_order']][t['item_code']]['stock_entry'] = se['name']
                    r[r['work_order']][t['item_code']]['consumed_qty'] = t['qty']
                    r[r['work_order']][t['item_code']]['yield'] = (t['qty']/r[r['work_order']][t['item_code']]['stock_qty'])*100 
                except:
                    pass
    return d



def get_columns(filters):
	"""return columns"""
	columns = [
		{"label": "Company", "fieldname": "company", "fieldtype": "Link", "options": "Company", "width": 150},
		{"label": "Production Plan", "fieldname": "production_plan", "fieldtype": "Link", "options": "Production Plan", "width": 150},
		{"label": "Work Order", "fieldname": "work_order", "fieldtype": "Link", "options": "Work Order", "width": 150},
		{"label": "BOM No.", "fieldname": "bom_no", "fieldtype": "Link", "options": "BOM", "width": 150},
		{"label": "FG Item", "fieldname": "fg_item", "fieldtype": "Data", "width": 120},
		{"label": "FG Name", "fieldname": "fg_name", "fieldtype": "Data", "width": 180},
		{"label": "FG Item Qty", "fieldname": "fg_qty", "fieldtype": "Float", "width": 100},
		{"label": "FG Produced Qty", "fieldname": "produced_qty", "fieldtype": "Float", "width": 100},
		{"label": "Consumed Items", "fieldname": "item_code", "fieldtype": "Link", "options": "Item", "width": 100},
		{"label": "Item Name", "fieldname": "item_name", "fieldtype": "Data", "width": 100},
		{"label": "Stock Entry", "fieldname": "stock_entry", "fieldtype": "Link", "options": "Stock Entry", "width": 150},
		{"label": "Net Qty", "fieldname": "net_qty", "fieldtype": "Float", "width": 100},
		{"label": "Gross Qty", "fieldname": "stock_qty", "fieldtype": "Float", "width": 100},
		{"label": "Consumed Qty", "fieldname": "consumed_qty", "fieldtype": "Float", "width": 100},
		{"label": "% Yield", "fieldname": "yield", "fieldtype": "Float", "width": 100}
	]

	return columns
	

	
columns = get_columns(filters)
temp_data = get_data(filters)
#print(temp_data[0])
list = []
for d in temp_data:
	#print(d)
	for item in d[d['work_order']]:
		list.append([d['company'], d['production_plan'], d['work_order'], d['bom_no'], d['fg_item'],d['fg_name'], d['fg_qty'], d['produced_qty'], item, d[d['work_order']][item]['item_name'],
		d[d['work_order']][item]['stock_entry'],d[d['work_order']][item]['net_qty'], d[d['work_order']][item]['stock_qty'], d[d['work_order']][item]['consumed_qty'], d[d['work_order']][item]['yield']  
		])

data = [columns, list]

name: BOM vs Actual duplicate
report_script:
def get_exploded_items(bom,raw = {},s_q=0,n_q=0):
	bom_q = frappe.db.get_value('BOM',bom,'quantity')
	""" Get all raw materials including items from child bom"""
	items = frappe.db.sql("""select bi.item_code, bi.item_name, bi.bom_no, bi.stock_uom, bi.stock_qty, bi.net_qty, 
				bi.stock_qty / ifnull(%s, 1) AS stock_qty_consumed_per_unit, bi.net_qty / ifnull(%s, 1) AS net_qty_consumed_per_unit,
				 bi.include_item_in_manufacturing from `tabBOM Item` bi where bi.parent = %s"""%(bom_q,bom_q,frappe.db.escape(bom)), as_dict=1 )
	for d in items:
		if d['bom_no']:
			raw = get_exploded_items(d['bom_no'],raw,(s_q*d['stock_qty_consumed_per_unit']),(n_q*d['net_qty_consumed_per_unit']))
			#frappe.msgprint(str(raw))
		else:
			if d['item_code'] in raw:
				#frappe.msgprint(str(d['item_code']))
				raw[d['item_code']] = {
					'stock_entry'				: '',
					'item_name'				: d['item_name'],
					'stock_uom'				: d['stock_uom'],
					'stock_qty'				: raw[d['item_code']]['stock_qty'] + d['stock_qty_consumed_per_unit'] * s_q,
					'net_qty'				: raw[d['item_code']]['net_qty']  + d['net_qty_consumed_per_unit'] * n_q,
					'consumed_qty'                          : 0,
					'yield'					: 0,
					'include_item_in_manufacturing': d.get('include_item_in_manufacturing', 0)
				}
				#frappe.msgprint(str(raw[d['item_code']]))

			else:
				raw[d['item_code']] = {
					'stock_entry'				: '',
					'item_name'				: d['item_name'],
					'stock_uom'				: d['stock_uom'],
					'stock_qty'				: d['stock_qty_consumed_per_unit'] * s_q,
					'net_qty'				: d['net_qty_consumed_per_unit'] * n_q,
					'consumed_qty'				: 0,
					'yield'					: 0,
					'include_item_in_manufacturing': d.get('include_item_in_manufacturing', 0)
                                }
				#frappe.msgprint(str(raw[d['item_code']]))

	return raw
	


	
def get_data(filters):
    conditions = ""
    if filters.get("from_date"):
	    conditions += " and date >= '%s'" % filters["from_date"]

    if filters.get("to_date"):
	    conditions += " and date <= '%s'" % filters["to_date"]

    if filters.get("company"):
	    conditions += " and company = '%s'" % filters["company"]
    else:
	    frappe.throw('Please Select company first')
	    
    d=frappe.db.sql("""SELECT company, production_plan ,name as work_order ,qty as fg_qty, produced_qty,
	production_item as fg_item, item_name as fg_name, bom_no FROM `tabWork Order` where docstatus = 1 and produced_qty > 0 %s """%conditions,as_dict=1)
	
    for r in d:
        r[r['work_order']]=get_exploded_items(r['bom_no'],{},r['fg_qty'],r['fg_qty'])
        se_name=frappe.get_list('Stock Entry',{'work_order': r['work_order']},'name')
        for se in se_name:
            temp=frappe.db.sql("""select item_code,sum(qty) as qty from `tabStock Entry Detail` sed, `tabStock Entry` se where sed.parent=%s and sed.parent = se.name and se.docstatus=1 and item_group!='Finished Goods' group by item_code""",se['name'],as_dict=1)
            for t in temp:
                try:
                    r[r['work_order']][t['item_code']]['stock_entry'] = se['name']
                    r[r['work_order']][t['item_code']]['consumed_qty'] = t['qty']
                    r[r['work_order']][t['item_code']]['yield'] = (t['qty']/r[r['work_order']][t['item_code']]['stock_qty'])*100 
                except:
                    pass
    return d



def get_columns(filters):
	"""return columns"""
	columns = [
		{"label": "Company", "fieldname": "company", "fieldtype": "Link", "options": "Company", "width": 150},
		{"label": "Production Plan", "fieldname": "production_plan", "fieldtype": "Link", "options": "Production Plan", "width": 150},
		{"label": "Work Order", "fieldname": "work_order", "fieldtype": "Link", "options": "Work Order", "width": 150},
		{"label": "BOM No.", "fieldname": "bom_no", "fieldtype": "Link", "options": "BOM", "width": 150},
		{"label": "FG Item", "fieldname": "fg_item", "fieldtype": "Data", "width": 120},
		{"label": "FG Name", "fieldname": "fg_name", "fieldtype": "Data", "width": 180},
		{"label": "FG Item Qty", "fieldname": "fg_qty", "fieldtype": "Float", "width": 100},
		{"label": "FG Produced Qty", "fieldname": "produced_qty", "fieldtype": "Float", "width": 100},
		{"label": "Consumed Items", "fieldname": "item_code", "fieldtype": "Link", "options": "Item", "width": 100},
		{"label": "Item Name", "fieldname": "item_name", "fieldtype": "Data", "width": 100},
		{"label": "Stock Entry", "fieldname": "stock_entry", "fieldtype": "Link", "options": "Stock Entry", "width": 150},
		{"label": "Net Qty", "fieldname": "net_qty", "fieldtype": "Float", "width": 100},
		{"label": "Gross Qty", "fieldname": "stock_qty", "fieldtype": "Float", "width": 100},
		{"label": "Consumed Qty", "fieldname": "consumed_qty", "fieldtype": "Float", "width": 100},
		{"label": "% Yield", "fieldname": "yield", "fieldtype": "Float", "width": 100}
	]

	return columns
	

	
columns = get_columns(filters)
temp_data = get_data(filters)
#print(temp_data[0])
list = []
for d in temp_data:
	#print(d)
	for item in d[d['work_order']]:
		list.append([d['company'], d['production_plan'], d['work_order'], d['bom_no'], d['fg_item'],d['fg_name'], d['fg_qty'], d['produced_qty'], item, d[d['work_order']][item]['item_name'],
		d[d['work_order']][item]['stock_entry'],d[d['work_order']][item]['net_qty'], d[d['work_order']][item]['stock_qty'], d[d['work_order']][item]['consumed_qty'], d[d['work_order']][item]['yield']  
		])

data = [columns, list]

name: Production Consumption
query:
select
se.name1,
sed.items_name,
sed.item_code,
sed.opening_qty,
sed.closing_qty,
sed.total_qty,
se.posting_date as "Date:Date",
se.posting_time as "Time:TIME"



from `tabconsumption` se , `tabconsumption table` sed
where
sed.parent=se.name1 and
se.posting_date>=%(from_date)s and se.posting_date<=%(to_date)s
order by se.posting_date desc;

name: consumtion report
query:
SELECT
sle.name,
sle.item_code,
(case when sle.posting_date < Date(%(from_date)s) then qty_after_transaction else 0 end) as "Before Transaction Qty",
/*(case when sle.posting_date < Date(%(from_date)s) then valuation_rate else 0 end) as "Before Transaction Rate",
(case when sle.posting_date < Date(%(from_date)s) then valuation_rate else 0 end) as "Stock value",*/
(case when sle.voucher_type = "Purchase Receipt" then sum(sle.actual_qty) else 0  end) as "Purchase Qty",
/*(case when sle.posting_date < Date(%(from_date)s) then valuation_rate else 0 end) as "Before Transaction Rate",
(case when sle.posting_date < Date(%(from_date)s) then valuation_rate else 0 end) as "Stock value",*/
(case when sle.posting_date >= Date(%(from_date)s) then qty_after_transaction else 0 end) as "Balance Transaction Qty",

sle.posting_date as "Posting Date",
sle.voucher_type,
sle.warehouse,
sle.company

FROM
  `tabStock Ledger Entry` sle group by item_code

name: BOM VS ACTUAL 2
query:
select *

from

(select 
wo.company as company,
wo.name,
wo.bom_no,
wo.production_item as fg_item,
wo.item_name as fg_item_name,
wo.qty as fg_qty,
wo.produced_qty as Produced_qty,
woi.parent,
woi.item_code,
woi.item_name as "itm",
woi.required_qty as "Gross QTY"
from `tabWork Order` as wo left join `tabWork Order Item` as woi
on wo.name=woi.parent
where wo.status!="Not Started" and wo.docstatus!=0) as ww left join

(select 
se.name,
se.work_order,
sed.item_code,
sed.item_name,
sed.parent,
sum(sed.qty) as consumed_qty
from `tabStock Entry` as se left join `tabStock Entry Detail` as sed 
on se.name=sed.parent
group by sed.item_code,se.work_order) as ss
on ss.work_order=ww.parent and ss.item_name=ww.itm

query:
columns = [ 
            {"label":"Company","fieldname": "Company","fieldtype": "data","width":120},
            {"label":"Work Order","fieldname": "Work Order","fieldtype": "data","width":120},
            {"label":"Bom No","fieldname": "Bom No","fieldtype": "data","width":120},
            {"label":"Fg Item","fieldname": "Fg Item","fieldtype": "data","width":120},
            {"label":"Fg Name","fieldname": "Fg Name","fieldtype": "data","width":120},
            {"label":"Fg Qty","fieldname": "Fg Qty","fieldtype": "data","width":120},
            {"label":"Produced Qty","fieldname": "Produced Qty","fieldtype": "data","width":120},
            {"label":"Consumed Item","fieldname": "Consumed Item","fieldtype": "data","width":120},
            {"label":"Item Name","fieldname": "Item Name","fieldtype": "data","width":120},
            {"label":"Stock Entry","fieldname": "Stock Entry","fieldtype": "data","width":120},
            {"label":"Gross Qty","fieldname": "Gross Qty","fieldtype": "data","width":120},
            {"label":"Consumed Qty","fieldname": "Consumed Qty","fieldtype": "data","width":120}
                             
               
            
        ]



res = frappe.db.sql(f"""select 
w.company as Company,
w.parent as "Work Order",
w.bom_no as "Bom No",
w.fg_item as "Fg Item",
w.fg_item_name as "Fg Name",
w.fg_qty as "Fg Qty",
w.Produced_qty as "Produced Qty",
w.item_code as "Consumed Item",
w.Item_Name as "Item Name",
s.name as "Stock Entry",
w.Gross_QTY as "Gross Qty",
s.consumed_qty as "Consumed Qty"



from

(select 
se.name,
se.work_order,
sed.item_code,
sed.item_name,
sed.parent,
sum(sed.qty) as consumed_qty
from `tabStock Entry` as se left join `tabStock Entry Detail` as sed 
on se.name=sed.parent
group by sed.item_code,se.work_order,se.name) as s right join 

(select 
wo.company as company,
wo.name,
wo.bom_no,
wo.production_item as fg_item,
wo.item_name as fg_item_name,
wo.qty as fg_qty,
wo.produced_qty as Produced_qty,
woi.parent,
woi.item_code,
woi.item_name as "Item_Name",
woi.required_qty as "Gross_QTY"
from `tabWork Order` as wo left join `tabWork Order Item` as woi
on wo.name=woi.parent
where wo.status!="Not Started" and wo.docstatus!=0) as w
on w.parent=s.work_order and w.item_code=s.item_code

group by s.work_order,s.item_code,s.name
order by s.name
""",as_dict = 1)

data = columns, res
report_script:
columns = [ 
            {"label":"Company","fieldname": "Company","fieldtype": "data","width":120},
            {"label":"Work Order","fieldname": "Work Order","fieldtype": "data","width":120},
            {"label":"Bom No","fieldname": "Bom No","fieldtype": "data","width":120},
            {"label":"Fg Item","fieldname": "Fg Item","fieldtype": "data","width":120},
            {"label":"Fg Name","fieldname": "Fg Name","fieldtype": "data","width":120},
            {"label":"Fg Qty","fieldname": "Fg Qty","fieldtype": "data","width":120},
            {"label":"Produced Qty","fieldname": "Produced Qty","fieldtype": "data","width":120},
            {"label":"Consumed Item","fieldname": "Consumed Item","fieldtype": "data","width":120},
            {"label":"Item Name","fieldname": "Item Name","fieldtype": "data","width":120},
            {"label":"Stock Entry","fieldname": "Stock Entry","fieldtype": "data","width":120},
            {"label":"Gross Qty","fieldname": "Gross Qty","fieldtype": "data","width":120},
            {"label":"Consumed Qty","fieldname": "Consumed Qty","fieldtype": "data","width":120}
           
            
        ]

def condition(filters):
    cond = ''
    if filters.get("from_date"):
        cond = cond + f"""where l.creation >= "{filters.get('from_date')}" """

    if filters.get("to_date"):
        cond = cond + f"""where l.creation <= "{filters.get('to_date')}" """

    return cond


cond = condition(filters)

res = frappe.db.sql(f"""select 
w.company as Company,
w.parent as "Work Order",
w.bom_no as "Bom No",
w.fg_item as "Fg Item",
w.fg_item_name as "Fg Name",
w.fg_qty as "Fg Qty",
w.Produced_qty as "Produced Qty",
w.item_code as "Consumed Item",
w.Item_Name as "Item Name",
s.name as "Stock Entry",
w.Gross_QTY as "Gross Qty",
s.consumed_qty as "Consumed Qty"



from

(select 
se.name,
se.work_order,
sed.item_code,
sed.item_name,
sed.parent,
sum(sed.qty) as consumed_qty
from `tabStock Entry` as se left join `tabStock Entry Detail` as sed 
on se.name=sed.parent
group by sed.item_code,se.work_order,se.name) as s right join 

(select 
wo.company as company,
wo.name,
wo.bom_no,
wo.production_item as fg_item,
wo.item_name as fg_item_name,
wo.qty as fg_qty,
wo.produced_qty as Produced_qty,
woi.parent,
woi.item_code,
woi.item_name as "Item_Name",
woi.required_qty as "Gross_QTY"
from `tabWork Order` as wo left join `tabWork Order Item` as woi
on wo.name=woi.parent
where wo.status!="Not Started" and wo.docstatus!=0) as w
on w.parent=s.work_order and w.item_code=s.item_code
group by s.work_order,s.item_code,s.name
order by s.name
""",as_dict = 1)

data = columns, res

name: Supplier Report
query:
select
s.supplier_name as "Supplier:Link/Supplier:500",
s.category as "Nature of Party:100",
date(s.modified) as "Modified Date",
a.city as "
a.state as "State::200",
a.email_id as "Email::200"
from `tabSupplier` s
join `tabDynamic Link` dl on  s.name = dl.link_name 
join `tabAddress` a on dl.parent= a.name 
group by s.name
